Activity: Log in to the system, check emails. Review the presentation for today's team meeting and address any last-minute concerns.
Finalize the presentation slides. Review and rehearse presentation.
Attend the team meeting. Present the research findings and preliminary framework for tracking fund performance and expenses. Solicit feedback and address any questions or concerns.
Following the team meeting, incorporate feedback received during the presentation into the preliminary framework document. Prioritize critical improvements.
Document any changes made to the framework based on the feedback received. Update the summary report with the final outcomes.
Prepare a final version of the preliminary framework document and the summary report for distribution to the team. Share the documents.
Wrap up the week's work. Respond to any remaining emails. Organize all documents and files. Back up all data. Reflect on the progress made and identify areas for future improvement.
Complete the weekly timesheet and submit it. Clear the workspace. Prepare for the weekend.
